Source.Name: abcMIDI
Source.Summary: a set of command line tools to work with ABC and midi music
Source.Description: Abcmidi is a package of programs supporting the ABC Music Notation Format (see http://abcnotation.com ). There are numerous programs included. For example, abc2midi converts an abc file to a MIDI file, midi2abc converts a midi file to an abc file, abc2abc transposes the music to a different key, yaps creates a Postscript file containing the music notation, midicopy copies a selected portion of a MIDI file, and abcsearch searches an abc file for specific musical patterns.
